name: Tech Guardian
tagline: Information Technology and Services Agency Hackney
description:
Tech Guardian Limited is the IT Department for businesses in the UK especially SMEs. We specialise in providing complete ICT services ranging from IT support to advance system and network design, installation and maintenance. We also cater to modern web and multimedia developments while also helping businesses to get the best deals when it comes to buying IT hardware and software.
Tech Guardian is presently the technological guardian of over 25 businesses in Greater London, Essex, Cambridge and Reading while our web services are patronised across UK and beyond geographical borders of Europe. Tech Guardian offers tailored ICT services to businesses in UK, Europe and the world at large. We offer IT Consultancy including IT Support service to businesses in UK especially London, Essex, Surrey, Cambridge and Reading. Our Web & Media Design service is patronised across the globe with clients in Europe, Asia, Africa, North America and South America. We also help with ICT recruitment while also helping business staff with practical IT training.
